column4: I am getting an error when I try to run configure. I installed build-essential. I get these errors: checking for main in -lopenal... no
checking for main in -lopenal32... no    checking for main in -lalut... no    checking OpenAL... no    configure: error: OpenAL is currently mandatory
Ok. You will need 'checkinstall'. See http://wiki.ubuntu.com/CheckInstall and the openal-dev package.
